Package ss.pentago.model.player.ai

Class MediumAI

  • java.lang.Object
    • ss.pentago.model.player.Player
      • ss.pentago.model.player.ai.AIPlayer
        • ss.pentago.model.player.ai.MediumAI
  • public class MediumAI
extends AIPlayer
    MediumAI is a type of AIPlayer that determines its strategy using a min-max algorithm. By default it looks 3 moves ahead.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class ss.pentago.model.player.Player

        marble, name, strategy
